primary_type.title: Primary dither pattern type
primary_type.description: MIRI LRS dither pattern type: point source OR extended target.

total_points.title: Total number of points in pattern
total_points.description: MIRI LRS total number of points in dither pattern: point source: 2, extended target: >= 1
total_points.calculation: If dither patter type is point source the value is 2.  If dither pattern type is extended target the value is the number of spectral steps x number of spatial steps.

spectral_position_number.title: Position number within spectral steps
spectral_position_number.description: MIRI LRS position number within spectral steps: >= 1
spectral_position_number.calculation: Determined by SDP tracking exposures within a dither pattern.

spectral_total_points.title: Total number of steps in spectral direction
spectral_total_points.description: MIRI LRS total number of steps in the spectral direction: point: 2, extended: >= 1
spectral_total_points.misc: PPS has set to NULL when dither pattern is POINT_SOURCE.

spectral_step_size.title: Size of steps in spectral direction
spectral_step_size.description: MIRI LRS distance between steps in the spectral direction: point source: 0.0; extended target: >= 0.0 (arcsec)
spectral_step_size.misc: PPS has set to NULL when dither pattern is POINT_SOURCE.

spectral_offset.title: Spectral offset from pattern start (arcsec)
spectral_offset.description: MIRI LRS spectral offset from pattern starting position (arcsec): >=0.0
spectral_offset.calculation: Determined by SDP tracking exposures within a dither pattern.

spatial_position_number.title: Position number within spatial steps
spatial_position_number.description: MIRI LRS position number within spatial steps: >= 1
spatial_position_number.calculation: Determined by SDP tracking exposures within a dither pattern.

spatial_total_points.title: Total number of steps in spatial direction
spatial_total_points.description: MIRI LRS total number of steps in the spatial direction: point: 0, extended: >= 1

spatial_step_size.title: Size of steps in spatial direction
spatial_step_size.description: MIRI LRS distance between steps in the spatial direction (arcsec): point source: -0.908, 0.908; extended target: >= 0.0

spatial_offset.title: Spatial offset from pattern start (arcsec)
spatial_offset.description: MIRI LRS spatial offset from pattern starting position (arcsec): >=0.0
spatial_offset.calculation: Determine spatial offset for dither point from step number and size.
